p: Regarding the extracts, the phytochemicals mainly present in R. officinalis are rosmarinic acid, camphor, caffeic acid, ursolic acid, betulinic acid, carnosic acid and carnosol [ 19, 38, 40, 48]. Therefore, R. officinalis is mainly composed of phenolic compounds, di- and triterpenes and essential oils [ 49, 50].
